thread.section_title: The Union Democrat, Sonora, CA News, Sports, & Weather
thread.title: Wildcat Ranch

title: Wildcat Ranch
text: By The Union Democrat Sports Department September 30, 2015 10:21 pm Maggie Beck / Union Democrat Sonora runner Jackson McIlroy nears the finish. For the first time in nearly 50 years, Sonora High hosted a cross-country meet.On Wednesday afternoon,Wildcat Ranch had its inaugural race in the third Mother Lode League meet of the season. The course was designed by 2014 Sonora graduate Steven Grolle and completed by current Wildcat Patrick McConnell. Follow UnionDemocrat.com
